        public static double AreaEquivalentDiameter(int area)
        Area equivalent diameter. Equation: sqrt((4 / Pi) * Area)
        Parameters:
        area - Area.
        Returns:
        Area equivalent diameter.

      • Circularity

        public double Circularity(int area,
                          int perimeter)
        Circularity. Equation: 4 * Pi * Area / (Perimeter ^ 2)
        Parameters:

        perimeter - Perimeter.
        Returns:
        Circularity.

      • Compactness

        feretDiameter - Feret diameter.
        Returns:
        Compactness.
